content: Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 06 Dec 2018Is there a fee if I deposit a cashier's order or cheque at the CIMB branch?I called and they gave me different answers. Also can someone else write me the cheque? Or I have to write my own cheque? Thanks!!2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Good Day Every DayLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 Dec 2018If you deposit the cashier order yourself, I am assuming both the payer and payee is yourself. Therefore, there is no fee. 0 comments0

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 Dec 2018There should not be a fee when depositing cheques. There is a fee however for writing a cashier's order (S$10, waived for the first 3 times).0 comments0
